name: Translate Text
description: Translate your transcribed text to any language using OpenAI. Say 'Translate to [language] [your text]'.
instructions:
Get your OpenAI API key: https://platform.openai.com/api-keys

Usage: Say 'Translate to Spanish Hello, how are you?' to translate text to Spanish.

The prompt uses {language} and {text} placeholders.

settings.name: model
settings.label: Model
settings.help_text: OpenAI model to use (e.g., gpt-5-mini, gpt-4o-mini, gpt-4o)

settings.name: prompt
settings.label: Prompt
settings.default: Translate the following text to {language}. Output only the translation, nothing else.
settings.help_text: Use {language} for target language and {text} for the text to translate.
